name: Josh Greenslade
goals: Transform my team to an AI-first approach
Master AI tools and champion adoption company-wide
Build world-class code review and quality practices
Make strategic tech debt and prioritization decisions
Create a culture of continuous learning and innovation

team_experience: Currently working solo, planning to build and lead a team
team_challenges: Building AI-first practices from the ground up
Establishing code quality standards and processes
Preparing to lead and mentor future team members

works_with: Product Manager - defining features and priorities
common_challenges: Balancing feature requests with technical excellence
Explaining technical complexity to non-technical stakeholders
Building trust in AI tools and practices

current_challenges: Building systems for scalability and maintainability
Balancing rapid development with code quality
Preparing for team growth and leadership
Creating processes that will scale with the team
Building expertise in AI tools and best practices
strengths: Strong technical fundamentals and architecture knowledge
Care deeply about code quality and best practices
Willing to learn and experiment with new tools
Committed to team growth and success

success_stories: Successfully using AI tools to accelerate development
Experimenting with AI-assisted code generation and refactoring
Building workflows and automation with AI assistance
concerns: Ensuring AI-generated code quality and security
Understanding when to use AI vs traditional approaches
Building best practices for AI tool usage
Preparing to teach others about responsible AI use

best_times: Early morning (7-9 AM) for focused learning
Lunch break (30-45 min) for quick exercises
Friday afternoons for reflection and planning
motivated_by: Seeing my team succeed and grow
Becoming the leader my team deserves

short_term: Establish AI code review processes and standards
